products.name: This is important to remember.
products.description: Love isn't like pie. You don't need to divide it among all your friends and loved ones.

products.name: It was so great to hear from you today
products.description: This is going to sound funny and a little strange, but you were in a dream I had just a couple of days ago.

products.name: She tried to explain that love wasn't like pie.
products.description: There wasn't a set number of slices to be given out.

products.name: Being in high school, Miles had no idea
products.description: There were girls in the world who might be nice to some boy who'd suffered the misfortune of falling in love with them.

products.name: Each failed overture of peace made the next
products.description: Before long, Gary realized their marriage lacked sufficient love and goodwill.
